== Один метод, один запрос ==

1. Без аннотаций

insert:
{{{
SET autocommit=0
select @@session.tx_read_only
insert into `test` (`value`) values ('1403168978755')
commit
}}}

select:
{{{
SET autocommit=0
select @@session.tx_read_only
select `id` from `test` where `value` = '1403169926882'
commit
}}}

select exception:
{{{
SET autocommit=0
select @@session.tx_read_only
select `id` from `test` where `value` = '1403171336579'
rollback
}}}
